scenarios.name: Already at the beach and ready to swim
scenarios.description: You have laid out a beach towel. You are wearing only your swim suit.

scenarios.name: Just arrived at beach
scenarios.description: In your bag you have a beach towel. Your swim suit is under your clothes.

algorithm:
If towel is in bag lay it on the sand
If wearing clothes and have swim suit on underneath then take off clothes
Walk to water
Make sure it looks safe
Check the temperature
Jump in
Start swimming
